backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, contact form submissions, and access-controlled admin queries using authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI image‑replacement change and mapping it to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in layout, UI components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining OKLCH color theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata, Google Fonts, root mount point, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout composing all sections, decorative effects, footer, and admin panel.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Admin panel trigger and sheet showing login controls and submissions panel, gated by identity.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSubmi: Admin panel that checks admin access and displays contact submissions with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
Component showing a radial cursor‑tracking spotlight when motion is allowed and pointer is fine.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBackgr: Fixed background component rendering decorative shapes, gradient overlays, and orb images.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass‑styled card wrapper with optional hover lift and light theme styling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated about section showing background, intro text, and developer description using scroll reveal.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form with validation, submission handling, success/error states, and scroll-reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Landing hero section with parallax effects, intro text, social links, and scroll-to-section actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Showcases featured projects with images, tags, and animated reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Displays a grid of skill icons with hover animations and scroll-reveal transitions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with smooth scrolling, desktop links, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data via an actor and track submission status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Returns a scroll-based offset value for parallax effects with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries for fetching contact submissions and checking admin status using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Provides a ref and visibility state to reveal elements when scrolled into view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables, utilities, animations, and reduced‑motion rules for the light theme.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Exports simple required‑field and email validators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, theme direction, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
